page.title: 15SWINLEY PARK FOREST.
page.content:
There are a number of{problems}that the foresters have to face. These include{vandalism}to the buildings and trees, and also the risk of{fire.} Each year approximately ten acres of trees are lost, and in 1976 50 acres were destroyed by fire. {Insect pests} include the Pine Shoot beetle and the Great Spruce Bark beetle. In the fight against these pests, the manager uses as few{chemicals}as possible because of the risks to wildlife and to the urban population, and the possibility of polluting local streams.
The forestry{industry}is a profitable one and the Sawmill is due to expand in the next ten years with the addition of another Windsor Estate Sawmill. It is also to have a timber treatment plant within the period.
